name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Many online apps can consolidate your purchases so you can get more accurate values.    It also helps that you use the base unit (pc) for other tasks too, like programming, etc, so it helps offset the price tag of a computer.    All hail the PC Gaming Master Race!
